text:
when creating modules in themes. What is the best way to link to default images located in the theme folder? I have tried this in the fields.json but it is not working for me.
"default" : {
    "src" : "../images/asta-banner.jpg",
    "alt" : "",
    "width" : "1440",
    "height" : "683"
  }

Hello Guys , I had theme and rename the folder and changed the inner path as well but some how css is not applying in the modules but css path is correct and even working on browser when I check from view source then what could be the problem ?
